file_content.text: [You slice the computer and disengage the security locks that bar entry to Section Zero.]
[While searching the mainframe, you notice an administrative control labeled "Power to Engineering Level."]

[Overloading or disabling the power conduits on the engineering level might distract the Advozse forces while you infiltrate Section Zero. Overloading will make a much bigger impact but will also certainly kill many of the Advozse working on that level.]
[You disable the power conduits, cutting power to the engineering level.]
[You sabotage the power conduits, wreaking havoc on the engineering level.]
